subject: junit xml schema?
msgSnippet: Hey folks! This is sorta related to junit, but not specifically.  I am writing some scripts to do some automated tests and need to report it to our Hudson
messageBody:
Hey folks!

This is sorta related to junit, but not specifically. I am writing some scripts to do some automated tests and need to report it to our Hudson servers in a junit style xml format. Unfortunately after I want to say is hundreds of web searches I have been unable to find a good explanation of what the junit xml format is.

Does anyone have a good page or know of a link to a schema or dtd or something for it.

Thanks
Jason
